abstract: In the latest incarnation of the hedge fund billionaires’ public spat over the nutritional supplements company Herbalife, one hedge fund manager (briefly) taunts another in a message on the Bloomberg terminal.
snippet: In the latest incarnation of the hedge fund billionaires’ public spat over the nutritional supplements company Herbalife, one hedge fund manager (briefly) taunts another in a message on the Bloomberg terminal.
lead_paragraph: It was a locker room diss between billionaires. But it took place on the computer screens of traders across Wall Street.

headline.main: Hedge Fund Drama, Appearing on Your Screen
